title: R4DS R4 nds firmware FW1.18 & YSMenu0903270000
description:
Replacement firmware for R4 cards.

Combines the last official R4 firmware v1.18, and firmware made from the latest version of YSMenu (YSMenu0903270000), supports games incompatible with v1.18.

Also includes infolib.dat and savlib.dat files to shorten loading times and add support for games that need 1MB save files (eg. Pokemon Platinum).

Firmware is in English.
